description:
Product Manager ⚡

FinTech start-up (Series B) 🚀

United States (remote) 🌎

$130-160k USD + equity💰


This exciting FinTech start-up that has recently secured its Series B funding round is looking for a Product Manager. Their primary role will be to work on customer facing features, with a focus on growth and acquisition. Given the company's growth trajectory, this is a very exciting opportunity to join a growing team in the Payments space.


Responsibilities

  • Develop and execute a comprehensive growth strategy that aligns with company goals and objectives.
  • Identify key metrics and KPIs to measure growth and engagement success, and regularly report on performance.
  • Conduct market research and competitive analysis to inform product decisions and identify new opportunities for user acquisition and engagement.
  • Collaborate with Marketing and Data Science teams to design and implement experiments, A/B tests, and campaigns to drive user growth and retention.
  • Work with Engineering and Design teams to prioritize and build features that enhance user experience and promote engagement.
  • Utilize data-driven insights to continuously iterate and improve the product, ensuring a seamless and engaging user journey.
  • Develop and maintain a product roadmap that focuses on growth and engagement initiatives, balancing short-term wins with long-term strategic goals.
  • Foster a user-centric culture within the product team, advocating for the needs and preferences of our users in all product decisions.
  • Stay current with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies to keep our product competitive and innovative.


Qualifications

  • 3+ years of experience in high-performing product teams.
  • Experience in FinTech / payments start-up environment is highly desired
  • Proven experience working with operations teams, product designers, other product managers, and engineering teams.
  • A forward-thinking vision with a humble approach.
  • Strong skills in data analysis and the use of analytical tools.
  • High technical aptitude and a keen interest in state-of-the-art ML/AI technologies.
